thread.title: BRIEF-Southern National Bancorp Of Virginia - J. Adam Sothen Tendered Resignation As Chief Financial Officer​

title: BRIEF-Southern National Bancorp Of Virginia - J. Adam Sothen Tendered Resignation As Chief Financial Officer​

organizations.name: reuters) - southern national bancorp of virginia inc

text: March 16, 2018 / 8:32 PM / Updated 12 minutes ago BRIEF-Southern National Bancorp Of Virginia - J. Adam Sothen Tendered Resignation As Chief Financial Officer​ Reuters Staff 1 Min Read March 16 (Reuters) - Southern National Bancorp Of Virginia Inc: * SOUTHERN NATIONAL BANCORP OF VIRGINIA - ‍ON MARCH 12 J. ADAM SOTHEN TENDERED RESIGNATION AS EXECUTIVE VICE PRESIDENT AND CHIEF FINANCIAL OFFICER​ * SAYS WILLIAM H. LAGOS APPOINTED INTERIM CFO - SEC FILING Source text ( bit.ly/2FYGz7Y ) Further company coverage: (Reuters.Brief@thomsonreuters.com)
